title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practice Competencies: Coach Learning and Development: Integrating Technology-Enhanced Learning and Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Educational Methodologies and General Knowledge of Language Education Fields

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized feedback by utilizing skill-enhancing tools (apps, platforms, etc.) in coaching scenarios.

Learners can collaboratively develop coach-learning scenarios applicable to real educational contexts with peers.
